    Function reference

    Plot themes

    Functions to assist with plot themes.

    ggeotheme()
    ggeo plot themes
    hc_purple_theme() hc_samarqand_theme() hc_web_theme()
    Highcharts themes

    ggplot2 helper functions

    Functions to assist with ggplot2 charts and maps.

    ggeo_capitalize_title()
    Copitalize plot title
    ggeo_coord()
    Return sf coord for given CRS code
    ggeo_label_sci_10() ggeo_label_pyramid() ggeo_label_abs_percent()
    Format labels
    ggeo_remove_breaks()
    Remove specific breaks
    ggeo_remove_title()
    Remove plot title
    ggeo_save()
    Save function

    Color palettes

    Functions to assist and help with color palettes.

    ggeopal_center()
    Return a color palette with option to center diverging palettes
    ggeopal_chooser()
    Return a paletteer palette depending on
    ggeopal_hex_to_hcl()
    Generate colors from a HEX color using HCL palette
    ggeopal_to_gradient()
    Create gradient for palette colors
